Question: In the November election, this person's party lost six U.S Senate seats to the Democrats, thus losing control of the U.S Senate.
Hints: In September 2008, this person joined the Gang of 20, a bipartisan group working towards comprehensive energy reform.
In 1991, this person became the president of the American Red Cross.
It has been speculated that the outcry over the "Godless" ad contributed to this person's loss.
